import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Plans.css' import { plansData } from '../../data/plansData' import tick from "../../assets/whiteTick.png" import rightArrow from "../../assets/rightArrow.png" function Plans() { const[selected,setSelected]=useState(false) const [indexSelected,setIndexSelected]=useState(null) console.log(test) const handleHover=(test,index)=>{ console.log(test) console.log(index) setIndexSelected(index) } const handleLeave=(test,index)=>{ console.log(test) console.log(index) } return (
READY TO START YOUR JOURNEY NOW
{plansData.map((elt,index)=>
handleHover(true, index)} onMouseOut={(e) => handleLeave(false, index)}> {elt.icon}
{elt.name}
$ {elt.price}
{elt.features.map((text,i)=>
{text}
)}
See more benefits
)}
) } export default Plans
